column4: hello i try to install ubuntu on my old pc, but i get an error when trying to mount the CD-Drive, " you installation CD-ROM couldn't be mounted" in output (f4) the system tries serveral times but keeps failing.... anyone?
sounds like a bad burn. first see if the md5sum of the iso is ok. if it is, burn at a low speed (2-4x)
cdrw is a good invention for iso burning I discovered :)
